name: Stunning night takeoff from Edinburgh:  Flybe Dash 8 Q400
description:
Departure from Edinburgh airport at night, onboard Flybe DHC8-Q400 G-JEDU operating flight BE267 to East Midlands.  We get treated to a great view of Edinburgh lit up at night and the town of Livingston as we climb away from the airport.

Video taken from seat 2A.

Airline:  Flybe
Flight:  BE267
Aircraft:  Bombardier DHC8-Q400 G-JEDU
From:  Edinburgh (EDI)
To:  East Midlands (EMA)
Departure:  19:25
Arrival:  20:11
Flight Time:  00:46
Seat:  2A
Flight Path:  http://goo.gl/10m8rv

Please enjoy the flight and feel free to subscribe/comment!

✈ ✈
Equipment used:

Camera: GoPro Hero4 Silver http://goo.gl/Wz7Uxt
Mount: Generic suction mount http://goo.gl/E2vRBs
Swivel Mount: http://goo.gl/vWQVne
Boya Frame Case for GoPro: http://goo.gl/tqM3H1
Battery: Anker E7 25600mAh  http://goo.gl/ZXfxOy
MicroSD cards: Sandisk 128GB http://goo.gl/KDjm4Y
